amendment.description: Amendment promotes the research, development, and demonstration of marine hydrokinetic energy technologies and improves the regulatory process for such programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 114-359 to promote the research, development, and demonstration of marine hydrokinetic energy technologies and improves the regulatory process for such programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Deutch.
